https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hvuiuB9BZAkzfxOhU7nlHwsMxIC.jpg While working on an in memoriam piece for a dead colleague, a famous news reporter loses track of the TV story and becomes part of a father-daughter relationship with the teenager left behind. Breaking News
